content:
Shanaka C. DeSoysa is a Vice President, Advanced Analytics at Wells Fargo. His research interests include AI, Data Science, Machine Learning, Computer Science.
 Download my resumé. --

summary: In this tutorial, we will show you how to build a messaging (SMS) chatbot using the OpenAI API and Twilio. We will also show you how to deploy the chatbot for free with Fly.io. By the end of this tutorial, you will have a chatbot that can answer questions and have a conversation with you via SMS.
title: Get Chatting with OpenAI GPT-3: How to Build a Messaging (SMS) Chatbot in Minutes

summary: Twitter chatbot that uses OpenAI’s ChatGPT and DALL-E 2 to answer questions and generate images. By following the steps outlined in this article, you can set up your own chatbot and start experimenting with these cutting-edge AI technologies.
title: Creating a Twitter Chatbot with OpenAI ChatGPT and DALL-E 2

summary: A model to assess ERP readiness is developed based upon the premise that business value is enhanced through the alignment of complementary factors occurring along four dimensions.
title: Readiness for ERP Implementation in an Organization: Development of an Assessment Model
